AllocateCreditPool.document:
This API is used to allocate credit pools to second-level resellers by distributors.
Callable roles: Distributor
AllocateCreditPool.name: Allocates credit pools to second-level resellers

AllocateCustomerCredit.document:
This API is used for a partner to set credit for a customer, such as increasing or lowering the credit and setting it to 0.
1. The credit is valid permanently and will not be zeroed regularly.
2. The customer's service will be suspended when its available credit is set to 0, so caution should be exercised with this operation.
3. To prevent the customer from making new purchases without affecting their use of previously purchased products, the partner can set their available credit to 0 after obtaining the non-stop feature privilege from the channel manager.
4. The set credit is an increment of the current available credit and cannot exceed the remaining allocable credit. Setting the credit to a negative value indicates that it will be repossessed. The available credit can be set to 0 at the minimum.

Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
AllocateCustomerCredit.name: Allocates credit to customers by a partner

ApproveClientApply.document:
Description: This API is used by resellers to review applications to become sub-customers. Note: This API is used to apply for the allowlist. If needed, please contact your business representative.

Callable roles: Reseller, Distributer, Second-level reseller
ApproveClientApply.name: Approve sub-customer application

ApproveSubAgentApply.document:
This API is used to approve applications for second-level resellers.
Invocation Role: Distributor.
ApproveSubAgentApply.name: Approves a second-level reseller application

CreateAccount.document:
This API is used to create Tencent Cloud customer accounts for distributor/second-level resellers.After the account is created, it will be automatically bound to the partner account.Note:
1. Create a Tencent Cloud account. The entered email address and mobile phone number need to be verified by the partner for validity.
2. Customers need to add personal information when logging in for the first time.
3. This interface needs to be applied for allowlist usage. Please contact the channel manager to initiate the application process.

Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
CreateAccount.name: Creates a customer account

CreateAndSendClientInvitationMail.document:
This API is used to perform operations. Application for allowlist is required before usage. If needed, contact your business representative to request allowlisting. The specific usage process is as follows;.
This API is used to create an invitation link. You can send the invitation link to your designated email address.
2. Customers need to click the invitation link in the mailbox, fill in and submit relevant information.
3. After customer submission, you can view the application of this sub-customer on the customer management page and review it.

This API is used to handle cases where if the designated mailbox does not receive the invitation link, you can send the invitation link returned by the API to the customer manually.
Invocation roles: resellers, distributors, second-level reseller.
CreateAndSendClientInvitationMail.name: Creates an invitation link for the customer

DescribeBillDetail.document:
Description: End-customer queries its own bill details.
Callable role: End-customer.
DescribeBillDetail.name: Queries the bill details

DescribeBillDownloadUrl.document:
Description: This API is used to download billing files and return billing file URLs for sub-customers.
Callable role: Enb-customer.
DescribeBillDownloadUrl.name: Downloads billing file links by customers

DescribeBillSummary.document:
Description: External API for L1 billing of Sub-customer billing center.
Callable role: End-customer.
DescribeBillSummary.name: External API for the L1 billing of the customer billing center

DescribeBillSummaryByPayMode.document:
This API is used to obtain the total amount of customer bills by payment mode.
Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
DescribeBillSummaryByPayMode.name: Obtains the total amount of customer bills by payment mode

DescribeBillSummaryByProduct.document:
Description: Obtain the summarized value of sub - account bills by product dimension.
Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
DescribeBillSummaryByProduct.name: Obtains the total amount of customer bills by product

DescribeBillSummaryByRegion.document:
Description: Obtain the summarized value of sub - account bills by region through API.
Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
DescribeBillSummaryByRegion.name: Obtains the total amount of customer bills by region

DescribeCustomerBillDetail.document:
This API is used to query the customer bill details by resellers.
Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller.
DescribeCustomerBillDetail.name: Queries the customer bill details

DescribeCustomerBillDownloadUrl.document:
This API is used to get the URL for downloading the customer bill file by reseller. The download conditions are as follows:
1. Detailed bills (billDetail and billDetailPack) can be downloaded starting from June 2022; resource bills (billResource and billResourcePack) can be downloaded starting from November 2023.
2. Bill packages (billDetailPack and billResourcePack) can only be downloaded after billing.
DescribeCustomerBillDownloadUrl.name: Get the URL for downloading the customer bill file by reseller

DescribeCustomerBillSummary.document:
This API is used to query the total amount of customer bills.
Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
DescribeCustomerBillSummary.name: Queries the total amount of customer bills

DescribeCustomerInfo.document:
This API is used to query sub-customer information.
Invocation roles: reseller, first-level distributor.
DescribeCustomerInfo.name: Queries the customer information

DescribeCustomerUin.document: This API is used to query the list of customer UINs.
DescribeCustomerUin.name: Queries the list of customer UINs

DescribeRebateDownloadUrl.document:
This API is used to download the commission bill file by resellers/agents. The file URL is returned.
Resellers/Agents can call this API.
DescribeRebateDownloadUrl.name: Queries the download link to the commission bill file by agents

ForceQN.document:
Forced Service Suspension settings and cancellation can be used only after the reseller is whitelisted.

Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
ForceQN.name: Sets and cancels forced service suspension

GetCountryCodes.document: This API is used to obtain country/region codes.
GetCountryCodes.name: This API is used to obtain country/region codes.

GetTradeConfigList.document:
This API is used to query industry information, including layer-1 industry and layer-2 industry.

Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller,End-customer
GetTradeConfigList.name: Queries the industry list

ModifyClientRemark.document:
This API is used to modify customer remarks.

Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
ModifyClientRemark.name: Modifies customer remarks

QueryAccountVerificationStatus.document:
This API is used to query the account verification status.
Callable roles: Distributor, Reseller
QueryAccountVerificationStatus.name: Queries the account verification status

QueryCreditAllocationHistory.document:
This API is used to query all the credit allocation records of a single customer.
Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
QueryCreditAllocationHistory.name: Queries credit allocation records

QueryCreditByUinList.document:
This API is used to query the credit of users in the list.
Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
QueryCreditByUinList.name: Queries credit by UIN list

QueryCustomerBillingQuota.document:
Description: This API is used for a sub-customer to real-time query its own total credit and remaining credit in USD.

Callable roles: Sub-customer
QueryCustomerBillingQuota.name: Query sub-customer credit

QueryCustomersCredit.document:
This API is used for a partner to the credits and basic information of cutomers.

Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
QueryCustomersCredit.name: Queries the credits of customers

QueryDirectCustomersCredit.document:
This API is used to query the credits of direct customers.
Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
QueryDirectCustomersCredit.name: Queries the credits of direct customers

QueryInvitationInfo.document:
Query usage information of invitation link. Once created, the data will only be retained for 60 days, and the system will automatically delete the invitation link after 60 days.
Invokable role types: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller.
QueryInvitationInfo.name: Query invitation link info

QueryPartnerCredit.document:
This API is used for a partner to query its own total credit, available credit, and used credit in USD.

Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
QueryPartnerCredit.name: Queries a partner's credit

QueryPendingClientsV2.document:
Description: This API is used by resellers to query the list of sub-customers pending review. Note: This API is used to apply for the allowlist. If needed, please contact your business representative.

Callable roles: Reseller, Distributer, Second-level reseller
QueryPendingClientsV2.name: Querying sub-customers in application

QueryPendingSubAgentsV2.document:
This API is used to query information of second-level resellers in application.
Invocation Role: Distributor.
QueryPendingSubAgentsV2.name: Query application in progress of a second-level reseller

QueryPolicyProductListByCode.document:
This API is used to query the product list information within the specified policy range. To call this API, contact your business manager to apply for adding it to the allowlist.
Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller
QueryPolicyProductListByCode.name: Queries the policy product range

QuerySubAgentsDetailV2.document:
This API is used to query information of second-level resellers.
Invocation Role:Distributor.
QuerySubAgentsDetailV2.name: Queries information of a second-level reseller

QueryT1IndirectCustomersDetail.document:
This API is used to query the indirect sub-customers of a distributor.
Invokable role type: Distributor
QueryT1IndirectCustomersDetail.name: Query indirect sub-customers of distributor

QueryVoucherAmountByUin.document:
This API is used by primary/secondary resellers to query the voucher quota based on the customer UIN.
Callable roles: Reseller, Distributor, Second-level reseller
QueryVoucherAmountByUin.name: Queries the voucher quota based on the customer UIN

QueryVoucherListByUin.document:
This API is used by primary/secondary resellers to query the voucher list based on the customer UIN.
Callable roles: Reseller, Distributor, Second-level reseller
QueryVoucherListByUin.name: Queries the voucher list based on the customer UIN

QueryVoucherPool.document:
This API is used by primary/secondary resellers to query the voucher quota pool.
Callable roles: Distributor, First-level reseller, Second-level reseller
QueryVoucherPool.name: Queries the voucher quota pool

SendVerifyCode.document:
This API is used to send a verification code for account registration.

Callable roles: Distributor, Second-level reseller, Reseller,End-customer
SendVerifyCode.name: Sends a verification code for account registration

Account type of a new customer.
Valid values: `personal`, `company`.

members.document:
Registered email address, which should be valid and correct.
such as "account@qq.com"
members.name: Mail

members.document:
Account password.
Length limit: 8-20 characters
A password must contain numbers, letters, and symbols (!@#$%^&*()). Space is not allowed.
members.name: Password

members.document: The confirmed password, which must be the same as that entered in the `Password` field.
members.name: ConfirmPassword

members.document:
Customer's mobile number.
The caller needs to ensure the validity and correctness of the mobile number. A global mobile number within a range of 1-32 digits is allowed.
The system will perform binding limit verification of the mobile number you provide, allowing a maximum of 5 accounts per mobile number.
members.name: PhoneNum

members.document:
Customer's country/region code, which can be obtained via the  [GetCountryCodes API](https://www.tencentcloud.com/document/product/1085/51416), such as "852".
Parameter value is not allowed to be 7,380,86.
members.name: CountryCode

members.document: Customer's ISO2 standard country/region code, which can be obtained via the [GetCountryCodes API](https://www.tencentcloud.com/document/product/1085/51416). It should correspond to the `CountryCode` field, such as `HK`.
members.name: Area

members.document:
VerifyCode. This parameter is required. 
Use the [SendVerifyCode API](https://www.tencentcloud.com/document/product/1085/65907) to obtain the verifycode.The SendVerifyCode API sends a 6-digit verifycode to your specified mobile number via SMS. After receiving it, you need to pass it along with other parameters.
members.name: VerifyCode

members.document: Extension field, which is left empty by default.
members.name: Extended

members.document:
Layer-1 industry id. This is a required item and can be obtained via the [ GetTradeConfigList  API](https://www.tencentcloud.com/zh/document/product/1085/68181),
such as "kghy_01".

members.document:
Layer-2 industry id. This is a required item and can be obtained via the [ GetTradeConfigList API](https://www.tencentcloud.com/zh/document/product/1085/68181),
such as "kghy_0101"

members.document:
Filter criteria, support the following filter parameters.
Note: Email, SubAgentUin, and ClientUin only support exact search. other conditions support fuzzy retrieval.The following are the definitions of filtering  items:

Name: specifies second-level reseller name.
SubAgentUin: specifies the uin of the second-level reseller.
Remark: specifies remark.
Mobile: specifies the mobile number.
Email: specifies email address.
ClientUin: specifies the Indirect customer uin.
members.name: FilterType

members.document:
Sorting method. sorts by binding time in ascending or descending order. defaults to descending order if not specified.
Desc: descending order.
acs: ascending.
